channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Could Drake’s ‘Nokia’ Be the Song of the Summer? The Public Weighs In | Billboard News
item.description: 🎶 Drake's 'Nokia' sparking summer vibes! ☀️ Are you feeling the heat? 🔥 #Drake #SongOfTheSummer #BillboardNews

item.title: Lorde, The 1975 & Lewis Capaldi: The Best Moments From Glastonbury 2025 Day 1
item.description: Glastonbury Day 1 vibes got us like 🎶🌟 Relive the magic with Lorde, The 1975, and Lewis Capaldi! #Glasto2025 #MusicMagic

item.title: KickFlip Is Billboard’s K-Pop Rookie of the Month for June: Exclusive Photos
item.description: 🌟 Meet KickFlip, Billboard’s K-Pop Rookie of the Month for June! 🎶📸 Check out their exclusive photos now! 🌟 #KPopRookie #BillboardWinners

item.title: Lewis Capaldi Makes Surprise Return to Glastonbury Two Years After Onstage Struggle with Tourette’s Syndrome
item.description: Guess who's back at Glastonbury! 🌟 Lewis Capaldi shines again after overcoming obstacles. Let's cheer for resilience and great music! 🎉 #LewisCapaldi #GlastonburyFestival

item.title: Lizzo Drops My Face Hurts From Smiling Mixtape Feat. SZA & Doja Cat, Proclaims Lizzo Summer
item.description: 🎉🔥 Lizzo bringing the heat with new mixtape ft. SZA & Doja Cat! Let's kick off a Lizzo Summer together! 💃☀️ #LizzoSummer #NewMusicAlert
